desc: Handmade original products: Beard & Moustache Oils, All-Natural Soy Candles and Scented Wax Melts.

layout.text: See our Summer Candles & Wax Melts

It's more than just our tagline. We create handsomely aromatic scents that awaken your senses. Whether it be our hand-poured candles or moustache & beard care products, we're working towards adding your ambiance to every space and bearded face.
